extracted_playbook.title: Identify Rust Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the installed version of Rust on Windows systems to check if it is affected.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running code that executes batch files with untrusted arguments?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Rust
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Rust to version 1.77.2 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: All Rust versions before 1.77.2 on Windows
